ValidationRule.description: The Initial Pricing Date should not be editable for Verizon accounts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin) ), Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', CQ_eQuote__c , ISCHANGED( CQ_Initial_Pricing_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot adjust the "Initial Pricing Date" on a Verizon Quote
